name: Legal Compliance Rules for NYC Municipal Policies
description: Comprehensive legal compliance rules covering federal, state, and local requirements

rules.description: Policy must include equal opportunity statement
rules.suggestion: Add equal opportunity statement: 'This organization is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, or any other legally protected status.'

rules.description: ADA compliance statement required for public-facing policies
rules.suggestion: Include ADA compliance statement and procedures for requesting reasonable accommodations.

rules.description: Privacy policy reference required for data collection policies
rules.suggestion: Reference the organization's privacy policy and data handling procedures.

rules.description: Anti-harassment policy must be clearly stated
rules.suggestion: Include comprehensive anti-harassment policy with reporting procedures and consequences.

rules.description: Whistleblower protection provisions for government policies
rules.suggestion: Include whistleblower protection provisions and anonymous reporting mechanisms.

rules.description: Freedom of Information Act compliance for government documents
rules.suggestion: Include FOIA compliance statement and procedures for public information requests.

rules.description: Conflict of interest policies must be addressed
rules.suggestion: Include conflict of interest provisions and disclosure requirements.

rules.description: OSHA safety requirements for workplace policies
rules.suggestion: Include OSHA compliance requirements and workplace safety procedures.
